Content: The Vice Chancellor of the Sri Jayawardenapura University Professor Sampath Amarathunge says that an evaluation center will be set up at parliament to provide knowledge to the parliamentarians to streamline incident management and evaluation processes. He said this while attending a function to open the entrepreneurship and invention center of the entrepreneurship study division of the Sri Jayawardenapura University. This is the first and only such center launched by a local university. It will provide facilities to the entrepreneurs who wish to begin new businesses. After opening the center, seven new businesses were launched. The vice chancellor also unveiled the website sefeni.lk on the occasion.
